post:
Hello Again, Take a look at this!

We're running i7's in France to provide 4+Ghz of raw computing power to give you the performance you need to give those single threaded tasks a boost.

We're also one of the few hosts that utilize VirtKick as our panel provider, this super easy to use panel makes your lives easier and allows us to focus on keeping the network running.

**$3 KVM**

1 vCPU  
1GB RAM  
5GB SSD (Raid 5)  
100Mbits (Fair use)  
[Order Link](https://c82.myvirtkick.com/machines/new?plan_id=15)

**$5 KVM**

2 vCPU  
2GB RAM  
10GB SSD (Raid 5)  
100Mbits (Fair use)
